LecTrac
// the ActionBarDrawerToggle needs this code: Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Your WITS password is the password that was issued to you when you became a Witsie.

In the fields below, please enter you student/lecturer ID and your WITS password, and save your changes. Your LecTrac password will then be reset to your WITS password.

If you have forgotten your WITS password please contact the CNS Helpdesk on (011) 717-1717 or email ithelp@wits.ac.za.
